sentences: Seekord ma ei saa teile tulla, võib-olla mõni teine kord.
Tavaliselt pirtsakas müüja on seekord väga abivalmis.
Senini polnud tal kunagi loosiõnne olnud, ehk veab vähemalt seekord.
context: The Estonian adverb 'seekord' combines 'see' (this) and 'kord' (time) to mean 'this time' or 'on this occasion'. It refers specifically to the current instance being discussed, as opposed to previous or future times. This is a temporal reference that emphasizes immediacy in the present context.
